subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Purdue recovered two onside kicks and Raheem Mostert returned a kickoff 99 yards for a touchdown before halftime to give Purdue a big lead, holding on for a victory over Western Michigan.
snippet: Purdue recovered two onside kicks and Raheem Mostert returned a kickoff 99 yards for a touchdown before halftime to give Purdue a big lead, holding on for a victory over Western Michigan.
